name: My Campaign World
description: Island world comprised of many small islands and several larger landmasses

content.title: World Overview
content.content:
# World Overview

**System:** Pathfinder 1e
**Tone:** ** High Magic, Piracy, Regional Intrigue, Naval Travel
**Magic Level:** ** Medium (low- and mid-level magic common; high-level magic rare)
**Technology:** ** Medieval-fantasy with magical augmentations

## Calendar System
Standard Calendar
- Months: 12

content.title: Cold War
content.content:
Cold war with Sahir-Ket (competing for Astral Vaults)
Deploys Leyghosts (illusion-saboteurs)
*Trade:** Part of Silver Accord with Cindareth and Sahir-Ket
*Distances:** ~400-500 miles from Sahir-Ket, ~300 miles to Nessavine, ~300 miles from Xarien Peaks
--

### 2. Varkal Shards
*Location:** North-central, heavily fortified  
*Government:** Draconic militaristic hierarchy  
*Culture:** Dragon-touched warriors, martial honor codes  
*Military:** Skymaul Host - Griffin-mounted warbands and siege dragons  
*Major Cities:**
**Drakkal-Thuun (Capital)** - Pop. 38,000, Rich - Martial academy, dragonbone forges
**Korrath's Hold** - Pop. 12,000, In-between - Warbeast pens, siege factories
**Vulkran Peak** - Pop. 6,800, Poor - Volcanic rituals, fire-shard mining
**Redscale** - Pop. 5,000, In-between - Border barracks, alchemical oils
**Ashbarrow** - Pop. 3,600, Poor - Ash lumber mills, martial tombs
*Conflicts:** Border tensions with Thalorim, resource competition
*Distances:** ~300 miles from both Thalorim and Grantholm
--

### 3. Cindareth Tradebelt
*Location:** Central eastern waters  
*Government:** Merchant oligarchy  
*Culture:** Trade-focused, contract-based society  
*Military:** Privateer fleets and mage-bank enforcers  
*Major Cities:**
**Vendralis (Capital)** - Pop. 55,000, Rich - Merchant ports, magebank headquarters
**Goldwharf** - Pop. 18,000, Rich - Coin refineries, bonded cargo
**Prismark** - Pop. 13,000, Rich - Gem market and divination halls
**Telnisar** - Pop. 11,500, In-between - Contract courts and minor guild halls
**Maelinport** - Pop. 9,000, In-between - Secondary port, shipwright enclave
**Darneth's Gate** - Pop. 8,500, In-between - Watchtower fortress and customs post
*Conflicts:** Mercantile cold war with Chainlands, proxy skirmishes
*Trade:** Controls Tideledger Consortium, part of Silver Accord
*Distances:** ~200 miles from Chainlands, ~100 miles from Blackharbor
--

### 4. Grantholm Chain
*Location:** West-central  
*Government:** Storm-priest theocracy  
*Culture:** Rune-carved traditions, storm worship  
*Military:** Stormwatch Orders - Rune-warriors and thunderpriests  
*Major Cities:**
**Karvengrim (Capital)** - Pop. 28,000, Rich - Storm temples, rune-carved walls
**Stormdelve** - Pop. 7,400, In-between - Lightning capture spires
**Blackforge** - Pop. 9,100, Rich - Adamantine foundries
**Deepwatch** - Pop. 4,900, Poor - Fortress-archive, sea watchposts
*Conflicts:** Elemental resource wars with Bregoros Flameward
*Distances:** ~250 miles from Bregoros, ~200 miles from Karr Volas
--

### 5. Isola Vedra Wilds
*Location:** Southwestern, isolated  
*Government:** Elemental druid circles  
*Culture:** Shapechanger clans, elemental monks  
*Military:** Beast-bonded warriors, elemental guardians  
*Major Cities:**
**Umbravale (Capital)** - Pop. 26,000, In-between - Animal spirits, elemental monks
**Windcall** - Pop. 5,800, Poor - Howling summit monastics
**Jarnathi** - Pop. 4,300, In-between - Shapechanger nomads, open markets
**Beastrest** - Pop. 3,900, Poor - Tamed beasts, natural hot springs
*Trade:** Neutral mediators, offer magical oaths of parley
*Distances:** ~300 miles from Kundari, ~200 miles from Orekh's Teeth
--

### 6. Nessavine Bloom
*Location:** Eastern-central, volatile magic currents  
*Government:** Fey court alliances  
*Culture:** Illusion houses, dreambinders  
*Military:** Illusory warfare specialists  
*Major Cities:**
**Sylverna (Capital)** - Pop. 24,000, Rich - Fey gate, illusion houses
**Tethlean Grove** - Pop. 6,500, In-between - Living tree halls
**Moontide Vale** - Pop. 5,300, In-between - Dreambinders and lunar pacts
**Briarreach** - Pop. 4,000, Poor - Thornspear warriors
*Conflicts:** Psionic cold war with Fel Ostrell, dreamsabotage
*Legendary Site:** Moon-Drowned Vault - Lost Fey Archive warped by lunar anomalies
*Distances:** ~150 miles from Sahir-Ket, ~250 miles from Fel Ostrell, ~200 miles from Jarthrum Cays
--

### 7. Sahir-Ket Constellate
*Location:** Eastern desert isles  
*Government:** Oracle-guided councils  
*Culture:** Desert mystics, star-readers  
*Military:** Mirrorflame Infiltrators - fire-cloaked operatives  
*Major Cities:**
**Sahket-Sul (Capital)** - Pop. 30,000, Rich - Oasis archives, sand-glass oracles
**Parchet's Rise** - Pop. 6,700, In-between - Astral bridges, flamewatch
**Oasisglass** - Pop. 5,200, In-between - Water-bound enchantments
**Crescent Lore** - Pop. 4,900, Poor - Sage vaults
**Flamehollow** - Pop. 3,500, In-between - Efreeti-traders and firebound garrisons
*Conflicts:** Arcane cold war with Thalorim over Astral Vaults
*Trade:** Part of Silver Accord, crystal scry-merchant networks
*Distances:** ~100-200 miles from Fel Ostrell, ~400 miles from Thalorim
--

### 8. Karr Volas Crags
*Location:** Northwest  
*Government:** Blacksteel monarchy  
*Culture:** Anvil guilds, iron traditions  
*Military:** Heavy infantry, siege specialists  
*Major Cities:**
**Ironsong Bastion (Capital)** - Pop. 27,000, In-between - Blacksteel thronehold
**Hammerwake** - Pop. 7,000, In-between - Anvil guilds
**Volmark** - Pop. 5,500, Poor - Shieldmaidens' commandery
**Crownwatch** - Pop. 6,300, Poor - High wall observatory
*Distances:** ~200 miles from Grantholm, ~250 miles from Sevryn Reach
--

### 9. The Chainlands
*Location:** Central southern, contested waters  
*Government:** Sea baron confederation  
*Culture:** Treaty-based alliances, salvage rights  
*Military:** Part of Tidebreaker League naval alliance  
*Major Cities:**
**Oathharbor (Capital)** - Pop. 16,000, In-between - Sea baron forums
**Ragged Chain** - Pop. 5,700, Poor - Shattered docks
**Tidebreak** - Pop. 4,600, Poor - Salvage pit bazaar
**Eastmooring** - Pop. 5,900, In-between - Treaty docks
*Conflicts:** Trade rivalry with Cindareth, frequent blockades
*Trade:** Part of Tidebreaker League against merchant expansion
*Distances:** ~200 miles from Cindareth, ~150 miles to Harthan Flotilla
--

### 10. Bregoros Flameward
*Location:** Southwest, volcanically active  
*Government:** Fire-priest hierarchy  
*Culture:** Ashblood clans, magma rituals  
*Military:** Ashforged Legion - Elemental golems and flamethrowers  
*Major Cities:**
**Pyraxis (Capital)** - Pop. 31,000, Rich - Fire-forged courts
**Emberholt** - Pop. 8,000, In-between - Lava chutes and mineral halls
**Cindermoor** - Pop. 7,200, Poor - Ashfield barracks
**Ashenreach** - Pop. 6,600, In-between - Earthblood altars
*Conflicts:** Elemental resource wars with Grantholm
*Legendary Site:** Sunsunder Pit - Underground battlefield irradiated by fallen star
*Distances:** ~200 miles from Grantholm, ~300 miles from Isola Vedra
--

### 11. Sevryn Reach
*Location:** Far north, icy outer waters  
*Government:** Dusk elven twilight courts  
*Culture:** Shadow-touched, spiritually remote  
*Military:** Shadow guards, twilight rangers  
*Major Cities:**
**Severas (Capital)** - Pop. 15,000, In-between - Twilight citadel, dusk elven sanctum
**Duskfall** - Pop. 5,200, Poor - Watchers' spire, border patrol
**Moonwarden** - Pop. 4,300, Poor - Shrine to fading gods
*Distances:** ~250 miles from Karr Volas, bordering icy outer waters
--

### 12. Torlin Mere Deltas
*Location:** Deep south, marshy  
*Government:** Alchemical guild councils  
*Culture:** Bog dwellers, necro-alchemists  
*Military:** Marsh defenders, alchemical warfare  
*Major Cities:**
**Mirewatch (Capital)** - Pop. 13,000, Poor - Bog-bound towers, marsh defenses
**Caulfen Hollow** - Pop. 4,600, Poor - Necrotic marsh wells, alchemical exports, black market hub
**Mossvault** - Pop. 3,800, Poor - Leechwater rituals, hidden root markets
*Trade:** Alchemical exports, black market operations
*Distances:** ~200 miles from Chainlands, ~150 miles from Kundari
--

### 13. Harthan Flotilla
*Location:** Mobile, central sea belt  
*Government:** Halfling flotilla democracy  
*Culture:** Ship-bound halflings, mobile traders  
*Military:** Part of Tidebreaker League  
*Major Cities:**
**Brightwherry (Capital)** - Pop. 18,000, In-between - Halfling shipyard and flotilla capital
**Driftpond** - Pop. 6,400, In-between - Fishing exports, lightship docks
**Bellamoor** - Pop. 5,500, In-between - Artisan anchor town
**Lightwake** - Pop. 3,900, Poor - Floating lighthouses
**Farfloat** - Pop. 4,200, Poor - Wave-glider builders
*Trade:** Mobile merchant fleet, fishing exports
*Distances:** ~100-200 miles from Chainlands at any given time
--

### 14. Mournbay Fen
*Location:** Southern-central, fog-covered  
*Government:** Necromantic academy council  
*Culture:** Death magic practitioners, bone smiths  
*Military:** Undead militia, fog-shroud tactics  
*Major Cities:**
**Mournbay (Capital)** - Pop. 14,000, In-between - Necromantic academy and fog-shrouded harbors
**Shadehook** - Pop. 5,700, Poor - Whisper market and bone smiths
**Necrossa** - Pop. 6,000, In-between - Undead militia garrison and crypt mint
*Conflicts:** Feared by neighbors, isolated diplomatically
*Legendary Site:** Whisper Cairns - Necromancer tomb-tunnels haunted by trapped voices
*Distances:** ~150 miles from Torlin, ~100 miles from Orekh's Teeth
--

### 15. Kundari Vines
*Location:** Southeast, dense jungles  
*Government:** Tribal caste system  
*Culture:** Vinekin tribes, totem worship  
*Military:** Giant-bonded warriors, bloodsport champions  
*Major Cities:**
**Kundari's Crown (Capital)** - Pop. 19,000, In-between - Jungle caste capital with ziggurats
**Vinebarrow** - Pop. 5,900, Poor - Rootwood carving and spice trade
**Totemrest** - Pop. 6,300, Poor - Giant-bonded tribals, bloodsport arenas
*Trade:** Spice exports, exotic woods
*Distances:** ~150 miles from Isola Vedra, ~100 miles from Torlin, ~250 miles from Fel Ostrell
--

### 16. Orekh's Teeth
*Location:** Central pirate zone  
*Government:** Pirate anarchy  
*Culture:** Salvagers, raiders, barter economy  
*Military:** Individual pirate crews  
*Major Cities:**
**Skarr Reef (Center)** - Pop. 11,000, Poor - Pirate-run haven, barter-based society
**Bloodstone Landing** - Pop. 4,700, Poor - Salvager dens and drinking pits
**Ravager's Haven** - Pop. 6,100, Poor - Fighting pits, slave trade hubs, dreamcursed cargo
*Trade:** Salvage, cursed items, illegal goods
*Legendary Site:** Leviathan Hinge - Giant kraken skeleton bridge between submerged ruins
*Distances:** ~100 miles from Kundari, ~100 miles from Mournbay, ~200 miles from Vedra
--

### 17. Xarien Peaks
*Location:** North-central, storm-shrouded  
*Government:** Closed monastic orders  
*Culture:** Storm crystal miners, wind monks  
*Military:** Storm-wielding monks  
*Major Cities:**
**Stormvault (Capital)** - Pop. 20,000, In-between - Mountain-locked sanctum, storm crystal vaults
**Galespire** - Pop. 5,000, In-between - Windward monastery
**Ironbluff** - Pop. 4,800, In-between - Closed forge enclave
*Legendary Site:** Vault of the Last Compass - Wind-sheltered temple pointing toward lost magic
*Distances:** ~300 miles from Thalorim, ~250 miles from Sevryn Reach
--

### 18. Val'Domar Sanctum
*Location:** West-central  
*Government:** Paladin theocracy  
*Culture:** Divine law, honor codes  
*Military:** Oathmead Orders, sacred naval patrols  
*Major Cities:**
**Dawnhall (Capital)** - Pop. 17,500, In-between - Sacred knight conclave and oathmead
**Paragon's Shore** - Pop. 5,400, In-between - Holy forge and cavalry training fields
**Knightshade Isle** - Pop. 4,900, Poor - Forbidden text vault, redemption trials
*Distances:** ~200 miles from Karr Volas, ~250 miles from Grantholm
--

### 19. Jarthrum Cays
*Location:** Southeastern, deep-sea  
*Government:** Coralborn council  
*Culture:** Sea elves, coral architecture  
*Military:** Aquatic warriors, singing mages  
*Major Cities:**
**Corallum (Capital)** - Pop. 16,000, Rich - Sea elf city beneath coral arcades
**Lurespire** - Pop. 6,100, In-between - Singing towers and aquatic libraries
**Pearlhearth** - Pop. 5,600, In-between - Jewel harvest and deep-sea vaults
*Distances:** ~150 miles from Fel Ostrell, ~200 miles from Jarthrum Cays
--

### 20. Fel Ostrell Fringe
*Location:** Southeast, psionic anomaly zone  
*Government:** Mind-mage collective  
*Culture:** Psionicists, dream researchers  
*Military:** Psionic warfare, mind shields  
*Major Cities:**
**Ostrell Prime (Capital)** - Pop. 14,000, In-between - Mind-mage conclave fortress
**Shardhold** - Pop. 5,000, Poor - Crystal labyrinth and scrying observatory
**Umbral Hollow** - Pop. 4,600, Poor - Dreamshade node and psionic spire
*Conflicts:** Psionic cold war with Nessavine, dream sabotage
*Distances:** Borders Sahir-Ket, Jarthrum, and Kundari
--

## Free Pirate Cities

### Blackharbor
*Population:** 31,000 (Rich)  
*Location:** Central hub island, ~100 miles from Cindareth, ~150 miles from Chainlands  
*Features:** Pirate capital, massive drydocks, rotating captain council, neutral ground for factions, black-market nexus  

### Sable Shoal
*Population:** 13,500 (In-between)  
*Location:** Hidden eastern lagoon, ~80 miles from Fel Ostrell  
*Features:** Smuggler haven, shadow cults, cursed salvage trade, illegal enchantments  

### Crimson Wreck
*Population:** 11,000 (Poor)  
*Location:** Western outer reefs, ~180 miles from Grantholm  
*Features:** Built from wrecked armada bones, anarchist freeport, blade-rule justice, arena duels  

### Redwake
*Population:** 14,200 (In-between)  
*Location:** Mobile city, usually ~120 miles from Chainlands  
*Features:** Floating tavern city of chained wrecks, mobile refuel dock, brawling festivals  

### The Concorde
*Population:** 18,000 (Rich)  
*Location:** Magically stabilized island, ~100 miles northeast of Chainlands  
*Features:** Neutral negotiation zone, enforced ceasefire, artifact exchanges, parley courts  
--

## Legendary Sites & Ruins
**Moon-Drowned Vault** (Nessavine Bloom) - Lost Fey Archive warped by lunar anomalies
**Leviathan Hinge** (Orekh's Teeth) - Giant kraken skeleton bridge between submerged ruins
**Whisper Cairns** (Mournbay) - Necromancer tomb-tunnels haunted by trapped voices
**Vault of the Last Compass** (Xarien Peaks) - Wind-sheltered temple pointing toward lost magic
**Sunsunder Pit** (Ashenreach) - Underground battlefield irradiated by fallen star
--

## Trade & Economy

### Major Trade Organizations
**Tideledger Consortium** - Controls shipping taxes (Cindareth/Chainlands)
**Voyant Cartel** - Crystal scry-merchant communication networks
**Silver Accord** - Trade alliance (Thalorim, Cindareth, Sahir-Ket)
**Tidebreaker League** - Naval alliance against merchant expansion
**Sable Compact** - Shadow economic pact among pirates and black markets

### Trade Regulations
**Arcane Tariffs** - Steep duties on high-level magical items
**Leyship Registry** - Mandatory magical augmentation registration
**Black Market Hubs** - Sable Shoal, Caulfen Hollow, Ravager's Haven

### Magical Contraband
**Street Drugs:** Dreamrot, Bitterfire, Voiddust (affect magic use)
**Cursed Items:** Common in pirate hoards and ruins
**Glyph-bombs:** Explode when scryed upon
**Dreamcursed cargo:** Causes nightmares and madness
--

## Current Conflicts

### Active Wars
1. **Thalorim vs. Varkal Shards** - Border skirmishes over leyline nodes
2. **Grantholm vs. Bregoros** - Elemental resource wars
3. **Cindareth vs. Chainlands** - Mercantile cold war with proxy battles

### Cold Wars & Espionage
1. **Thalorim vs. Sahir-Ket** - Competing for Astral Vaults
Thalorim: Leyghosts (illusion-saboteurs)
Sahir-Ket: Mirrorflame Infiltrators
2. **Nessavine vs. Fel Ostrell** - Illusory warfare and psionic assaults

### Diplomatic Alliances
**Silver Accord** - Thalorim, Cindareth, Sahir-Ket (trade & defense)
**Tidebreaker League** - Chainlands, Harthan, Mirewatch (anti-merchant)
**Concorde Pact** - Neutral enforcement on Concorde Isle
**Druidic Mediators** - Isola Vedra offers magical parley oaths

content.title: Seasonal Cycles
content.content:
Seasonal Cycles](#calendar--seasonal-cycles)
3. [Major Cultural Groups](#major-cultural-groups)
4. [Magic in Society](#magic-in-society)
5. [Regional Powers](#regional-powers)
6. [Free Pirate Cities](#free-pirate-cities)
7. [Legendary Sites & Ruins](#legendary-sites--ruins)
8. [Trade & Economy](#trade--economy)
9. [Current Conflicts](#current-conflicts)
--

## World Overview
*World Type:** Island archipelago with numerous small islands and several major landmasses  
*Magic Level:** Medium (low- and mid-level magic common; high-level magic rare)  
*Technology:** Medieval-fantasy with magical augmentations  
*Tone:** High Magic, Piracy, Regional Intrigue, Naval Travel  
*Current Age:** Age of Sails and Storms  
--

## Calendar & Seasonal Cycles

### Calendar System
**Format:** Pathfinder Golarion calendar
**Structure:** 12 months, 365 days, 7-day weeks
**Week Days:** Moonday, Toilday, Wealday, Oathday, Fireday, Starday, Sunday
**Major Holidays:** 
Firstbloom (spring start)
Armasse (military festival)
Radiant Fire (mid-summer)

### Seasonal Events
**Typhoon Season (Months 4-6):** Inter-island shipping halts; dangerous naval travel
**Spirit Tides (Months 2 & 8):** Lunar alignment brings fey crossings, hauntings, divine visions; magic acts strangely
**Ashfall Moon (Month 10):** Volcanic smoke causes regional darkness in Bregoros
--

## Major Cultural Groups

### Ashblood (Bregoros Flameward)
Fire-reverent clans who cremate dead in sacred magma pools
Renowned for obsidian rites and earthbinding rituals

### Coralborn (Jarthrum Cays)
Amphibious sea-elves and humans born to coral arcs
Customs include dream-singing and tide tattoos

### Vinekin (Kundari Vines)
Tribal junglefolk devoted to vine totems and ancestor beasts
Practice caste-marks and sanctioned blood rites
--

## Magic in Society

### Common Applications (Spells up to 3rd level)
**Daily Life:** Guild apprentices, street healers, navigators, port clerics
**Trade:** Enchanted tools, food preservation, water generation, minor wards
**Travel:** Wind-guiding charms, waterwalking rafts, sea creature repellents
**Religion:** Community healing, blessings, crop fertility, plague containment

### Restricted Magic (6th level+)
Limited to archmages, ancient beings, and state institutions
High-level spellcasters feared or revered
Teleportation, scrying, and resurrection tightly controlled

### Criminal Magic
Magical smuggling, illusion theft, charm cons, potion doping
Anti-magic patrols in port cities
Cursed item trade flourishing in pirate havens
--

## Regional Powers

### 1. Thalorim Isles
*Location:** Northeast, leyline-infused waters  
*Government:** Elven isolationist magocracy  
*Culture:** High elven, focused on leyline research and arcane mastery  
*Military:** Arcane Armada - Crystal-clad warships powered by leyline surges  
*Major Cities:**
**Elun'vyr (Capital)** - Pop. 42,000, Rich - High elven spires, leyline research, naval command
**Virelen** - Pop. 9,500, In-between - Artisan district, magical glassworks
**Lys'Alae** - Pop. 4,200, Rich - Healing sanctum and sacred groves
**Telar'nor** - Pop. 3,000, Poor - Stargazer enclave, moonstone exports
**Cyndorai** - Pop. 7,100, Rich - Arcane academies and teleportation rings
*Conflicts:** 
Skirmishes with Varkal Shards over shared borders
Cold war with Sahir-Ket (competing for Astral Vaults)
Deploys Leyghosts (illusion-saboteurs)
*Trade:** Part of Silver Accord with Cindareth and Sahir-Ket
*Distances:** ~400-500 miles from Sahir-Ket, ~300 miles to Nessavine, ~300 miles from Xarien Peaks
--

**Crescent Lore** - Pop. 4,900, Poor - Sage vaults
**Flamehollow** - Pop. 3,500, In-between - Efreeti-traders and firebound garrisons
*Conflicts:** Arcane cold war with Thalorim over Astral Vaults
*Trade:** Part of Silver Accord, crystal scry-merchant networks
*Distances:** ~100-200 miles from Fel Ostrell, ~400 miles from Thalorim
--

### 8. Karr Volas Crags
*Location:** Northwest  
*Government:** Blacksteel monarchy  
*Culture:** Anvil guilds, iron traditions  
*Military:** Heavy infantry, siege specialists  
*Major Cities:**
**Ironsong Bastion (Capital)** - Pop. 27,000, In-between - Blacksteel thronehold
**Hammerwake** - Pop. 7,000, In-between - Anvil guilds
**Volmark** - Pop. 5,500, Poor - Shieldmaidens' commandery
**Crownwatch** - Pop. 6,300, Poor - High wall observatory
*Distances:** ~200 miles from Grantholm, ~250 miles from Sevryn Reach
--

### 9. The Chainlands
*Location:** Central southern, contested waters  
*Government:** Sea baron confederation  
*Culture:** Treaty-based alliances, salvage rights  
*Military:** Part of Tidebreaker League naval alliance  
*Major Cities:**
**Oathharbor (Capital)** - Pop. 16,000, In-between - Sea baron forums
**Ragged Chain** - Pop. 5,700, Poor - Shattered docks
**Tidebreak** - Pop. 4,600, Poor - Salvage pit bazaar
**Eastmooring** - Pop. 5,900, In-between - Treaty docks
*Conflicts:** Trade rivalry with Cindareth, frequent blockades
*Trade:** Part of Tidebreaker League against merchant expansion
*Distances:** ~200 miles from Cindareth, ~150 miles to Harthan Flotilla
--

### 10. Bregoros Flameward
*Location:** Southwest, volcanically active  
*Government:** Fire-priest hierarchy  
*Culture:** Ashblood clans, magma rituals  
*Military:** Ashforged Legion - Elemental golems and flamethrowers  
*Major Cities:**
**Pyraxis (Capital)** - Pop. 31,000, Rich - Fire-forged courts
**Emberholt** - Pop. 8,000, In-between - Lava chutes and mineral halls
**Cindermoor** - Pop. 7,200, Poor - Ashfield barracks
**Ashenreach** - Pop. 6,600, In-between - Earthblood altars
*Conflicts:** Elemental resource wars with Grantholm
*Legendary Site:** Sunsunder Pit - Underground battlefield irradiated by fallen star
*Distances:** ~200 miles from Grantholm, ~300 miles from Isola Vedra
--

### 11. Sevryn Reach
*Location:** Far north, icy outer waters  
*Government:** Dusk elven twilight courts  
*Culture:** Shadow-touched, spiritually remote  
*Military:** Shadow guards, twilight rangers  
*Major Cities:**
**Severas (Capital)** - Pop. 15,000, In-between - Twilight citadel, dusk elven sanctum
**Duskfall** - Pop. 5,200, Poor - Watchers' spire, border patrol
**Moonwarden** - Pop. 4,300, Poor - Shrine to fading gods
*Distances:** ~250 miles from Karr Volas, bordering icy outer waters
--

### 12. Torlin Mere Deltas
*Location:** Deep south, marshy  
*Government:** Alchemical guild councils  
*Culture:** Bog dwellers, necro-alchemists  
*Military:** Marsh defenders, alchemical warfare  
*Major Cities:**
**Mirewatch (Capital)** - Pop. 13,000, Poor - Bog-bound towers, marsh defenses
**Caulfen Hollow** - Pop. 4,600, Poor - Necrotic marsh wells, alchemical exports, black market hub
**Mossvault** - Pop. 3,800, Poor - Leechwater rituals, hidden root markets
*Trade:** Alchemical exports, black market operations
*Distances:** ~200 miles from Chainlands, ~150 miles from Kundari
--

### 13. Harthan Flotilla
*Location:** Mobile, central sea belt  
*Government:** Halfling flotilla democracy  
*Culture:** Ship-bound halflings, mobile traders  
*Military:** Part of Tidebreaker League  
*Major Cities:**
**Brightwherry (Capital)** - Pop. 18,000, In-between - Halfling shipyard and flotilla capital
**Driftpond** - Pop. 6,400, In-between - Fishing exports, lightship docks
**Bellamoor** - Pop. 5,500, In-between - Artisan anchor town
**Lightwake** - Pop. 3,900, Poor - Floating lighthouses
**Farfloat** - Pop. 4,200, Poor - Wave-glider builders
*Trade:** Mobile merchant fleet, fishing exports
*Distances:** ~100-200 miles from Chainlands at any given time
--

### 14. Mournbay Fen
*Location:** Southern-central, fog-covered  
*Government:** Necromantic academy council  
*Culture:** Death magic practitioners, bone smiths  
*Military:** Undead militia, fog-shroud tactics  
*Major Cities:**
**Mournbay (Capital)** - Pop. 14,000, In-between - Necromantic academy and fog-shrouded harbors
**Shadehook** - Pop. 5,700, Poor - Whisper market and bone smiths
**Necrossa** - Pop. 6,000, In-between - Undead militia garrison and crypt mint
*Conflicts:** Feared by neighbors, isolated diplomatically
*Legendary Site:** Whisper Cairns - Necromancer tomb-tunnels haunted by trapped voices
*Distances:** ~150 miles from Torlin, ~100 miles from Orekh's Teeth
--

### 15. Kundari Vines
*Location:** Southeast, dense jungles  
*Government:** Tribal caste system  
*Culture:** Vinekin tribes, totem worship  
*Military:** Giant-bonded warriors, bloodsport champions  
*Major Cities:**
**Kundari's Crown (Capital)** - Pop. 19,000, In-between - Jungle caste capital with ziggurats
**Vinebarrow** - Pop. 5,900, Poor - Rootwood carving and spice trade
**Totemrest** - Pop. 6,300, Poor - Giant-bonded tribals, bloodsport arenas
*Trade:** Spice exports, exotic woods
*Distances:** ~150 miles from Isola Vedra, ~100 miles from Torlin, ~250 miles from Fel Ostrell
--

### 16. Orekh's Teeth
*Location:** Central pirate zone  
*Government:** Pirate anarchy  
*Culture:** Salvagers, raiders, barter economy  
*Military:** Individual pirate crews  
*Major Cities:**
**Skarr Reef (Center)** - Pop. 11,000, Poor - Pirate-run haven, barter-based society
**Bloodstone Landing** - Pop. 4,700, Poor - Salvager dens and drinking pits
**Ravager's Haven** - Pop. 6,100, Poor - Fighting pits, slave trade hubs, dreamcursed cargo
*Trade:** Salvage, cursed items, illegal goods
*Legendary Site:** Leviathan Hinge - Giant kraken skeleton bridge between submerged ruins
*Distances:** ~100 miles from Kundari, ~100 miles from Mournbay, ~200 miles from Vedra
--

### 17. Xarien Peaks
*Location:** North-central, storm-shrouded  
*Government:** Closed monastic orders  
*Culture:** Storm crystal miners, wind monks  
*Military:** Storm-wielding monks  
*Major Cities:**
**Stormvault (Capital)** - Pop. 20,000, In-between - Mountain-locked sanctum, storm crystal vaults
**Galespire** - Pop. 5,000, In-between - Windward monastery
**Ironbluff** - Pop. 4,800, In-between - Closed forge enclave
*Legendary Site:** Vault of the Last Compass - Wind-sheltered temple pointing toward lost magic
*Distances:** ~300 miles from Thalorim, ~250 miles from Sevryn Reach
--

### 18. Val'Domar Sanctum
*Location:** West-central  
*Government:** Paladin theocracy  
*Culture:** Divine law, honor codes  
*Military:** Oathmead Orders, sacred naval patrols  
*Major Cities:**
**Dawnhall (Capital)** - Pop. 17,500, In-between - Sacred knight conclave and oathmead
**Paragon's Shore** - Pop. 5,400, In-between - Holy forge and cavalry training fields
**Knightshade Isle** - Pop. 4,900, Poor - Forbidden text vault, redemption trials
*Distances:** ~200 miles from Karr Volas, ~250 miles from Grantholm
--

### 19. Jarthrum Cays
*Location:** Southeastern, deep-sea  
*Government:** Coralborn council  
*Culture:** Sea elves, coral architecture  
*Military:** Aquatic warriors, singing mages  
*Major Cities:**
**Corallum (Capital)** - Pop. 16,000, Rich - Sea elf city beneath coral arcades
**Lurespire** - Pop. 6,100, In-between - Singing towers and aquatic libraries
**Pearlhearth** - Pop. 5,600, In-between - Jewel harvest and deep-sea vaults
*Distances:** ~150 miles from Fel Ostrell, ~200 miles from Jarthrum Cays
--

### 20. Fel Ostrell Fringe
*Location:** Southeast, psionic anomaly zone  
*Government:** Mind-mage collective  
*Culture:** Psionicists, dream researchers  
*Military:** Psionic warfare, mind shields  
*Major Cities:**
**Ostrell Prime (Capital)** - Pop. 14,000, In-between - Mind-mage conclave fortress
**Shardhold** - Pop. 5,000, Poor - Crystal labyrinth and scrying observatory
**Umbral Hollow** - Pop. 4,600, Poor - Dreamshade node and psionic spire
*Conflicts:** Psionic cold war with Nessavine, dream sabotage
*Distances:** Borders Sahir-Ket, Jarthrum, and Kundari
--

## Free Pirate Cities

### Blackharbor
*Population:** 31,000 (Rich)  
*Location:** Central hub island, ~100 miles from Cindareth, ~150 miles from Chainlands  
*Features:** Pirate capital, massive drydocks, rotating captain council, neutral ground for factions, black-market nexus  

### Sable Shoal
*Population:** 13,500 (In-between)  
*Location:** Hidden eastern lagoon, ~80 miles from Fel Ostrell  
*Features:** Smuggler haven, shadow cults, cursed salvage trade, illegal enchantments  

### Crimson Wreck
*Population:** 11,000 (Poor)  
*Location:** Western outer reefs, ~180 miles from Grantholm  
*Features:** Built from wrecked armada bones, anarchist freeport, blade-rule justice, arena duels  

### Redwake
*Population:** 14,200 (In-between)  
*Location:** Mobile city, usually ~120 miles from Chainlands  
*Features:** Floating tavern city of chained wrecks, mobile refuel dock, brawling festivals  

### The Concorde
*Population:** 18,000 (Rich)  
*Location:** Magically stabilized island, ~100 miles northeast of Chainlands  
*Features:** Neutral negotiation zone, enforced ceasefire, artifact exchanges, parley courts  
--

## Legendary Sites & Ruins
**Moon-Drowned Vault** (Nessavine Bloom) - Lost Fey Archive warped by lunar anomalies
**Leviathan Hinge** (Orekh's Teeth) - Giant kraken skeleton bridge between submerged ruins
**Whisper Cairns** (Mournbay) - Necromancer tomb-tunnels haunted by trapped voices
**Vault of the Last Compass** (Xarien Peaks) - Wind-sheltered temple pointing toward lost magic
**Sunsunder Pit** (Ashenreach) - Underground battlefield irradiated by fallen star
--

## Trade & Economy

### Major Trade Organizations
**Tideledger Consortium** - Controls shipping taxes (Cindareth/Chainlands)
**Voyant Cartel** - Crystal scry-merchant communication networks
**Silver Accord** - Trade alliance (Thalorim, Cindareth, Sahir-Ket)
**Tidebreaker League** - Naval alliance against merchant expansion
**Sable Compact** - Shadow economic pact among pirates and black markets

### Trade Regulations
**Arcane Tariffs** - Steep duties on high-level magical items
**Leyship Registry** - Mandatory magical augmentation registration
**Black Market Hubs** - Sable Shoal, Caulfen Hollow, Ravager's Haven

### Magical Contraband
**Street Drugs:** Dreamrot, Bitterfire, Voiddust (affect magic use)
**Cursed Items:** Common in pirate hoards and ruins
**Glyph-bombs:** Explode when scryed upon
**Dreamcursed cargo:** Causes nightmares and madness
--

## Current Conflicts

### Active Wars
1. **Thalorim vs. Varkal Shards** - Border skirmishes over leyline nodes
2. **Grantholm vs. Bregoros** - Elemental resource wars
3. **Cindareth vs. Chainlands** - Mercantile cold war with proxy battles

### Cold Wars & Espionage
1. **Thalorim vs. Sahir-Ket** - Competing for Astral Vaults
Thalorim: Leyghosts (illusion-saboteurs)
Sahir-Ket: Mirrorflame Infiltrators
2. **Nessavine vs. Fel Ostrell** - Illusory warfare and psionic assaults

### Diplomatic Alliances
**Silver Accord** - Thalorim, Cindareth, Sahir-Ket (trade & defense)
**Tidebreaker League** - Chainlands, Harthan, Mirewatch (anti-merchant)
**Concorde Pact** - Neutral enforcement on Concorde Isle
**Druidic Mediators** - Isola Vedra offers magical parley oaths

content.title: World Overview
content.content:
# World Overview

**System:** Pathfinder 1e
**Tone:** High Magic, Piracy, Regional Intrigue, Naval Travel
**Magic Level:** Medium; low- and mid-level magic is fairly common and integrated into society through guilds, temples, and merchant services. High-level magic (6th-level spells and above) remains rare, usually restricted to archmages, ancient beings, and closely guarded state institutions.
**Technology:** Medieval-fantasy baseline with magical augmentations (e.g., arcane-powered ships, enchanted navigation tools)

## Calendar System
Golarion Calendar
- Months: 12

content.title: World Overview
content.content:
# World Overview

**System:** Pathfinder 1e
**Tone:** High Magic, Piracy, Regional Intrigue, Naval Travel
**Magic Level:** Medium; low- and mid-level magic is fairly common and integrated into society through guilds, temples, and merchant services. High-level magic (6th-level spells and above) remains rare, usually restricted to archmages, ancient beings, and closely guarded state institutions.
**Technology:** Medieval-fantasy baseline with magical augmentations (e.g., arcane-powered ships, enchanted navigation tools)

## Calendar System
Golarion Calendar
- Months: 12
